content: made that s why we skip 3 sts 3dc next st *skip 2 sts 3dc next st* repeat * to * until next point 3dc ch2 3dc in ch2sp skip 3 sts 3dc in next st *skip 2 sts 3dc next st* repeat * to * for rem of round slip_stitch to 1st st round 17 slip_stitch over and into ch2 space ch3 2dc ch2 3dc in ch2 space 3dc in each space until next point 3dc ch2 3dc in ch2sp 3dc each space for rem of round slip_stitch to 1st st round 18 repeat round 17 you will now repeat row 11-18 one more time this will be rounds 19- 26 round 27-33 slip_stitch over and into ch2 space ch3 2dc ch2 3dc in ch2 space 3dc each space until next point 3dc ch2 3dc in ch2 space 3dc each space for rem of round round 34 slip_stitch over and into ch2 space ch2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc ch1 2hdc in ch2 space 1hdc each st until next point 2hdc ch1 2hdc in ch2 space 1hdc each st for rem of round slip_stitch to 1st st fasten_off and weave in ends you will now be adding the collar round 1 fasten on yarn in a st around the neck opening ch3 counts as 1st double_crochet 1dc each st around slip_stitch to 1st st round 2-4 ch3 *1fpdc 1bpdc* repeat * to * for rem of round slip_stitch to 1st st *note if you would like more of a cowl neck continue the post stitch round for as many row as you would like* fasten_off and weave in ends
